Package org.fcrepo.persistence.ocfl.impl

Class UpdateNonRdfSourceHeadersPersister

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.persistence.ocfl.impl.UpdateNonRdfSourceHeadersPersister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persister
    public class UpdateNonRdfSourceHeadersPersister
extends Object
    This class implements the persistence of the headers for an RDFSource to bring in new system managed properties
    Since:
    6.0.0
    Author:
    mikejritter
